subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=彳07}}

# going [[on foot]]
# [[empty-handed]]
# [[useless]], [[in vain]]
# [[disciple]]
# a [[party]], a [[gang]]
# [[criminal]], [[penal]] [[servitude]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text: {{ja-kanjitab|いたずら|yomi=k}}

subSections.title: Adjective
subSections.text:
{{ja-adj|いたずら|hhira=いたづら|decl=nari}}
# {{lb|ja|classical}} [[useless]], [[pointless]], [[fruitless]]
# {{lb|ja|classical}} [[unsatisfied]] because there is nothing to be; [[tasteless]]
# {{lb|ja|classical}} in [[idleness]]

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|いたずら|hhira=いたづら}}
#a kind of women's hairstyles in the late Edo period

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|徒らに|いたずらに|uselessly, pointlessly}}
* {{ja-r|悪戯|いたずら|prank, mischief}}
